ModelPhoneme.title: Summary
ModelPhoneme.content:
ModelPhoneme-M-CV1

{
  "Date started": "2024-06-20 @ 13:20:42",
  "Model": {
    "model_phoneme.model.Model": {
      "pretrained": false
    }
  },
  "Setup": {
    "epochs": 50,
    "batch": 128,
    "log_interval": 50,
    "saved_models_path": "./assets"
  },
  "Optimizer": {
    "torch.optim.SGD": {
      "lr": 5e-05,
      "momentum": 0.9,
      "nesterov": true,
      "weight_decay": 0.0005
    }
  },
  "Dataset": {
    "model_phoneme.dataset.Dataset": {
      "datalist_root": "/home/cxnam/Documents/MyWorkingSpace/Trainer/assets/data.txt",
      "audio_dataroot": "",
      "visual_dataroot": "",
      "lm_dataroot": "/home/cxnam/Documents/MyWorkingSpace/MEAD/M003/Features/face_meshes",
      "transcript_dataroot": "/home/cxnam/Documents/MyWorkingSpace/MEAD/M003/Features/transcripts",
      "num_frames": 15,
      "fps": 25,
      "sample_rate": 22050,
      "n_mels": 80,
      "n_fft": 800,
      "img_size": 128,
      "lm_scale": 256,
      "training": {
        "key": "train",
        "yes": true,
        "no": false
      }
    }
  },
  "Transforms": {
    "Training": {
      "utils.transforms.ToTensor1D": {},
      "utils.transforms.RandomFlip": {
        "p": 0.5
      },
      "utils.transforms.RandomScale": {
        "max_scale": 1.5
      },
      "utils.transforms.RandomPadding": {
        "out_len": 220500
      },
      "utils.transforms.RandomCrop": {
        "out_len": 220500
      },
      "utils.transforms.RandomNoise": {
        "snr_min_db": 10.0,
        "snr_max_db": 120.0,
        "p": 0.25
      }
    },
    "Validation": {
      "utils.transforms.ToTensor1D": {},
      "utils.transforms.RandomPadding": {
        "out_len": 220500,
        "train": false
      },
      "utils.transforms.RandomCrop": {
        "out_len": 220500,
        "train": false
      }
    }
  },
  "Scheduler": {
    "torch.optim.lr_scheduler.ExponentialLR": {
      "gamma": 0.96
    }
  }
}
